sentences.en: At first he pooh - poohed the story, but he became thoughtful when she showed him the shadow.
sentences.cn: 起初他对这个故事一笑置之,后来达林太大拿出影子给他看, 他就沉思起来了.

sentences.en: British actors have long pooh - poohed the Method ( Stephen Schiff )
sentences.cn: 英国演员们早已对体验派表演方法不耐烦了( 斯蒂芬希夫 )

sentences.en: He just listened for a while and pooh - poohed her idea.
sentences.cn: 他只听了一会儿就对她的意见嘘嘘地表示反对.

sentences.en: I thought it was quite a good idea, but she pooh - poohed it.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是个相当好的主意, 但她对此不屑一顾.

sentences.en: In the past he has pooh-poohed suggestions that he might succeed Isaacs.
sentences.cn: 过去他对自己会接替艾萨克斯之说嗤之以鼻。

sentences.en: The bank manages the case pooh - poohed closes down and cannot pay, also can happen.
sentences.cn: 银行经营不善倒闭而不能支付的情况, 也会发生的.

sentences.en: They pooh - poohed our scheme for raising money.
sentences.cn: 他们对我们的筹款方案嗤之以鼻.
他们对那个意见嗤之以鼻.

phrases.tran_cn: 小熊维尼（一卡通片名称）
